<!-- Contact Section -->
<div class="section section-light">
<div class="container">

<div class="grid-2">

<!-- Contact Form -->
<div class="feature-card">
<h3>Send us a Message</h3>

<form id="contactForm" onsubmit="submitContactForm(event)" style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem;">

<div>
<label for="name" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 500;">Name</label>
<input type="text" id="name" name="name" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.75rem; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 6px;">
</div>

<div>
<label for="email" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 500;">Email</label>
<input type="email" id="email" name="email" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.75rem; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 6px;">
</div>

<div>
<label for="company" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 500;">Company</label>
<input type="text" id="company" name="company" style="width: 100%; padding: 0.75rem; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 6px;">
</div>

<div>
<label for="topic" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 500;">Topic</label>
<select id="topic" name="topic" style="width: 100%; padding: 0.75rem; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 6px;">
<option value="demo">Request a Demo</option>
<option value="pricing">Pricing Question</option>
<option value="features">Feature Enquiry</option>
<option value="enterprise">Enterprise Sales</option>
<option value="partnership">Partnership</option>
<option value="other">Other</option>
</select>
</div>

<div>
<label for="message" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 500;">Message</label>
<textarea id="message" name="message" rows="5" required style="width: 100%; padding: 0.75rem; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 6px; resize: vertical;"></textarea>
</div>

<button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">
<i class="bi bi-send"></i> Send Message
</button>

<div id="formStatus" style="display: none; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 6px; margin-top: 0.5rem;"></div>

</form>

<script>
async function submitContactForm(event) {
  event.preventDefault();

  const form = event.target;
  const submitBtn = form.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
  const statusDiv = document.getElementById('formStatus');
  const originalText = submitBtn.innerHTML;

  submitBtn.disabled = true;
  submitBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="bi bi-hourglass-split"></i> Sending...';
  statusDiv.style.display = 'none';

  try {
    const response = await fetch('https://app.praevius.app/api/contact', {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
      body: JSON.stringify({
        name: form.name.value,
        email: form.email.value,
        company: form.company?.value || '',
        topic: form.topic.value,
        message: form.message.value
      })
    });

    const data = await response.json();

    if (response.ok) {
      statusDiv.style.display = 'block';
      statusDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#D1FAE5';
      statusDiv.style.color = '#065F46';
      statusDiv.innerHTML = '<strong>✓ Message sent!</strong> We\'ll get back to you soon.';
      form.reset();
    } else {
      statusDiv.style.display = 'block';
      statusDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#FEE2E2';
      statusDiv.style.color = '#991B1B';
      statusDiv.innerHTML = '<strong>✗ Error:</strong> ' + (data.error || 'Failed to send message. Please try again.');
    }
  } catch (error) {
    statusDiv.style.display = 'block';
    statusDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#FEE2E2';
    statusDiv.style.color = '#991B1B';
    statusDiv.innerHTML = '<strong>✗ Network error.</strong> Please try again or email us directly.';
  } finally {
    submitBtn.disabled = false;
    submitBtn.innerHTML = originalText;
  }
}
</script>
</div>
